accounts.name: authority
docs: The admin with authority to approve seats

accounts.name: seat
docs: The seat account to be approved

instructions.name: approve_seat
docs: Approves a trader's request for a seat in the market.
Only market administrators can approve seat requests.
Once approved, the trader can deposit funds and participate in the market.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The admin with authority to approve seats

accounts.name: seat
docs: The seat account to be approved

instructions.name: borrow
docs: Allows a trader to borrow assets from the market.
The trader must have sufficient collateral in their deposit.
Borrowed amounts are subject to the market's loan-to-value ratio.

accounts.name: market
docs: The market receiving the lent assets
Verify market is active and accepting Borrows

accounts.name: collateral_market
docs: The collateral market account

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint of the asset being Borrowed

accounts.name: collateral_mint
docs: The collateral mint of the asset being Borrowed

accounts.name: vault
docs: The market vault where assets will be stored

accounts.name: collateral_vault
docs: The collateral market vault where assets will be stored

accounts.name: seat
docs: The trader's seat in the market

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Allows a trader to deposit assets to the market.
The trader must have an approved seat.
The deposited assets can be used either as collateral for borrowing
or for lending in the peer-to-peer market.

accounts.name: trader
docs: The trader lending assets

accounts.name: market_header
docs: The market header account that will be initialized and stores market metadata

accounts.name: market
docs: The market receiving the lent assets
Verify market is active and accepting deposits

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint of the asset being deposited

accounts.name: vault
docs: The market vault where assets will be stored

accounts.name: seat
docs: The trader's seat in the market

instructions.name: initialize_market
docs: Initializes a new lending market.
This function creates a new market account and associated vault for storing tokens.
The market will track lending positions and collateral positions separately.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that creates and manages the market

accounts.name: market_header
docs: The market header account that will be initialized and stores market metadata

accounts.name: market
docs: The market account that will be initialized

accounts.name: collateral_market
docs: The collateral market account that will be initialized

accounts.name: market_vault
docs: The token vault associated with the market for storing assets
Should be a PDA derived from the market and token mint

accounts.name: mint
docs: The token mint that this market will use

accounts.name: collateral_mint
docs: The collateral token mint that this market will use

accounts.name: collateral_token_program
docs: The collateral token program that this market will use

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The token program interface

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program

accounts.name: optimizer_program
docs: The optimizer program

instructions.name: lend
docs: Allows a trader to lend assets in the peer-to-peer market.
The trader must have previously deposited funds.
Only non-collateral funds can be used for peer-to-peer lending.

accounts.name: trader
docs: The trader lending assets

accounts.name: market_header
docs: The market header account that will be initialized and stores market metadata

accounts.name: market
docs: The market receiving the lent assets
Verify market is active and accepting Lends

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint of the asset being Lended

accounts.name: vault
docs: The market vault where assets will be stored

accounts.name: seat
docs: The trader's seat in the market

accounts.name: trader
docs: The trader lending assets

accounts.name: market_header
docs: The market header account that will be initialized and stores market metadata

accounts.name: market
docs: The market receiving the lent assets
Verify market is active and accepting deposits

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint of the asset being deposited

accounts.name: vault
docs: The market vault where assets will be stored

accounts.name: seat
docs: The trader's seat in the market

instructions.name: repay
docs: Allows a trader to repay borrowed assets to the market.
Repayments cover both principal and accrued interest.
Excess repayment amounts are ignored.

accounts.name: trader
docs: The trader lending assets

accounts.name: market_header
docs: The market header account that will be initialized and stores market metadata

accounts.name: market
docs: The market receiving the lent assets
Verify market is active and accepting Repays

accounts.name: collateral_market
docs: The collateral market receiving the lent assets
Verify market is active and accepting Repays

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint of the asset being Repayed

accounts.name: collateral_mint
docs: The collateral mint of the asset being Repayed

accounts.name: vault
docs: The market vault where assets will be stored

accounts.name: seat
docs: The trader's seat in the market

instructions.name: request_seat
docs: Allows a trader to request a seat in the market.
A seat is required to participate in lending and borrowing activities.
The request must be approved by a market administrator before the trader can participate.

accounts.name: trader
docs: The trader requesting a seat

accounts.name: market_header
docs: The market header

accounts.name: seat
docs: The seat account to be created

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that creates and manages the market

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that creates and manages the market

accounts.name: optimizer_program
docs: The optimizer program

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Allows a trader to withdraw their deposited assets from the market.
The trader can only withdraw funds that are not being used as collateral
or actively lent in peer-to-peer matches.

accounts.name: market
docs: The market receiving the lent assets
Verify market is active and accepting Withdraws

accounts.name: collateral_market
docs: The collateral market account

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint of the asset being Withdrawed

accounts.name: collateral_mint
docs: The collateral mint of the asset being Withdrawed

accounts.name: vault
docs: The market vault where assets will be stored

accounts.name: collateral_vault
docs: The collateral market vault where assets will be stored

accounts.name: seat
docs: The trader's seat in the market

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidAuthority
errors.msg: Invalid authority, only admin can make this call

errors.name: FailedToLoadMarketFromAccount
errors.msg: Failed to load market from account

errors.name: IdenticalMarketAndCollateralMarket
errors.msg: Identical market and collateral market, both cannot be the same

errors.name: RepaymentFailed
errors.msg: Repayment failed, Amount resolved to zero as repayment amount
